A4.text: Gene Hackman in the 1978–1987 Superman film series

A5.text: Jesse Eisenberg in the DC Extended Universe (2016–2017)

A6.text: He played the supervillain Lex Luthor in Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, which was released in March 2016, to generally negative reviews.

A7.text: His performance in particular was criticized by comic book fans and film reviewers, later earning him the Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Supporting Actor.
